subject: Families and Family Life
Football
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Eagles Coach Andy Reid’s two eldest children, Garrett, 24, and Britt, 22, are in prison, their lives spiraling in a protracted corkscrew brought on by drug addiction.
snippet: Eagles Coach Andy Reid’s two eldest children, Garrett, 24, and Britt, 22, are in prison, their lives spiraling in a protracted corkscrew brought on by drug addiction.
